newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Microsoft view raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Microsoft view raised.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist raised its earnings estimates for Microsoft Corp after the company reported fiscal third quarter, ending March 31, earnings that exceeded expectations.
-- Hambrecht raised its fiscal 1997 estimate to $2.64/shr from $2.33 and fiscal 1998 to $3.26/shr from $2.70.
-- Microsoft reported third quarter earnings of $0.79/shr versus the year ago net income of $0.44/shr and analysts' consensus estimate of $0.64/shr.
-- In a statement, Hambrecht analyst Christopher Galvin called Microsoft's third quarter resluts "outstanding." He maintains a buy rating on the stock.
